description: http://do-the-right-things.blogspot.com/2012/12/cavaet-in-using-kgpg-in-ubuntu.html
can't start. this program is designed for "Kubuntu", not ubuntu. couldn't find its config file. very suck program.
It doesn't start, no error message, nothing
Doesn't open when I select the application. Notta, Nill...
The most Distros, even the most advanced, like Fedora 26, that I'm on now, use gpg v1.4 - I don't know why. The current version is 2.1.21 from 2017-05-15, and today we are 2017-05-15??!
summary: Much better than old versions of GnuPG, like 1.4-2.0

description: Today's GNU/Linux(R) OS Distributions, even those, with always the top notch software, like FedoraProject.org, are using GnuPG ver. 1.4, because all the versions above, and exclusively Gnupg versions 2+, aren't compatible with key newest message distributing systems for both, rpm based, and deb based Linux Distros.
summary: I would like to correct my previous review

description: Первый запуск сработал. Затем приложение перестало работать
deleted very fast

Also I'm not using KDE I eventually found KGpg.
It took me a little while to find the Editor until I found it under the File menu, as the Applets did not appear in Ubuntu.

On installation, by the time KGpg popped up I had already imported via the command line, my keys from the file exported from my Mac, but no problem.
summary: Just what I needed, having come from macOS!

description: First time I ran it, it ran once and never reappeared. Did the usual. Found this fix which worked: http://do-the-right-things.blogspot.com/2012/12/cavaet-in-using-kgpg-in-ubuntu.html I haven't test drove it extensively yet so I'll just give it 3 for the moment.
Wont open at all

I dont know how, but somehow I managed to work system tray in Debian.

Seemed like a really good program... and it might be - it it would launch! Installed & launched the first time but never again.

Removed!
summary: only launched first time. never again

description:
App functions as you would expect with a modification.

After the first run the program will not start again from the icon.
The following update worked for me...

update /usr/share/applications/org.kde.kgpg.desktop
 edit line Exec=kgpg %U to Exec=kgpg -k %U

After that the program starts as you would expect.
summary: App needs to be updated for startup

description: But then of course the whole thing of encryption is rather complicated so I guess some people don't go to the bottom of it and give up. But it does exactly what it says in the description.
Could you please fix it? It doesn't seem to launch.
summary: It does not launch on Kubuntu 20.10

description: The app launches, but is hidden. To open run in terminal kgpg -k and the window should pop up
Worked once then stopped launching

I don't understand (obviously!) why GPG need to be so damn complicated and unintuitive. OK - I am a beginner. I try to understand, but nagging popups that can't be turned off force me to uninstall software that - potentially - could be great... if someone with UX in mind designed the interface, that is. Sorry for being an ass, but this is a perfect example why it is so hard to switch to Linux.
summary: Popups that you cant turn off, complicated and unintuitive software

description:
Just installed + tried this for the first time, and I am pretty new to PGP tools myself (started learning in early 2021), but in less than 10 minutes it's running and I've been able to import my own public/secret key pair, plus the 9 other keys on my keyring. These export files were made using Kleopatra (and the other program that goes with it) on Windows.

I just wanted to post this quickly, because this program had a 2-star rating, and I don't see why. Looks like it works well to me. And a "thank you" from me to whoever put this program up for us to use, for free!  ( :
summary: Don't know why people are complaining

description: Used once then stopped launching
Can't reopen after launched once
Anybody idea how to solve this problem? thanks
summary: cant open after re-boot. can anybody troubleshoot?

description: Completely broken and without function. Will likely work once when u first install and then never again

The software does work but for whatever reason doesn't like to run without sudo unless you restart and have launch at startup enabled. Only workaround is to run in terminal "sudo kgpg" and setup that way, you can still point to store your keys and config to your normal user home folder but you will always have to run as root to launch. 

Devs when you get a second brew up a coffee and take a look cheers

Seemed to work well and did what I needed it to do, like many had the appear once then never again issue but found this 

http://do-the-right-things.blogspot.com/2012/12/cavaet-in-using-kgpg-in-ubuntu.html

Which did the trick
This works very well. If it doesn't seem to load, just type kgpg -k
Works fine for me. Nothing to add.
I have used it before, and it is always reliable, working first time. 5 stars deserved. Nice.
I don't understand why most of the apps you find for Ubuntu never get updated anymore. This one is a prime example. Their website shows the latest being 23.08.2 and this is 21.12.3.
doesnt open at all

Naaaaja.

blokced. That means my notebook is infiltrated by malware. Very peculiar.
ich hoffe das wird bald korrigiert

description: Neuinstallation bringt scheinbar auch nichts ...

description: Na toll. Nach dem zweiten Aufruf startet GKpg nicht mehr. Und der Fehler existiert schon seit mehr als einem Jahr. Gibt es hier denn keine Qualitätssicherung im Softwarecenter??? Raus mit der App aus dem Repository !

KGpg starts only with option -k aka key-management, which is not straight forward as expected by most users i guess.
KGpg is very basic with only a few functions. E.g. token managemnt ist missing completly.

ist der Code vertrauenswürdig? wäre in so einer Anwendung nicht so vorteilhaft, wenn es nicht der Fall wäre.
Grüße!
Nur ein Aufruf möglich, danach startet das Programm nicht mehr.

Sehr gutes Schlüsselverwaltungsprogramm. Leider ist die Installation fehlerhaft. Aus dem Startmenü heraus lässt es sich nicht aufrufen, weil der falsche Befehl eingetragen ist. Richtig ist: "kgpg -k". Die Startdatei muss entsprechend geändert werden - oder man startet das Programm im Terminal.
summary: Achtung: Startet nur mit dem Befehl "kgpg -k"

description: Das Programm startet nur beim ersten Mal. Danach muss man es im Terminal mit 'kgpg -k' starten, dann geht's auch wieder! Ist natürlich nicht so wie es sollte.

Nach der ersten Installation lässt sich KGpg zwar starten, aber danach nicht mehr. 
Beim Erststart kann man einen Schlüssel generieren und sich die Menüs ansehen, aber ein zweites mal lässt sich das Programm nicht mehr staten. KGpg ist somit nutzlos geworden .
ne fonctonne pas
установил по инструкции, после установки и создания ключа не запускается, совсем. Даже после переустановки.
Не удалось установить недостаточно прав!
